resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: .2.But stony-hearty quarryes scorne to graceThe humble entrance of such bowers as mine,The pensill proud, disdaynes, so poore a placeWith his rich oyles & mineralls should shine,The humorous grape, denyes into my baseAnd wortheles Cruze to spill his sparkling wine.   So looke on me, my starrs: I neither can   Picture, engraue, or feast a Noble man.        .3.But is there (Muse) no way but one of thoseFrom silence dull, our honest Cell to sheild?What though the niggard Earth dos not discloseHer wondrous Jeat, nor glistring ore vs yeild?The sage prophetique Raven to compose,Or th’ancient knots, therwith our bower to guild.   There cannot chuse, but be more wayes to frame   True honours to the great Norrey'sian name.        .4.For why share I this quill? or what doth moueThe Lawrell-louing Phoebus to allowThe neuer fadeing favours of his loveTo winde themselues about my simple brow?
resource.chars:
.2.
But stony-hearty quarryes scorne to grace
The humble entrance of such bowers as mine,
The pensill proud, disdaynes, so poore a place
With his rich oyles & mineralls should shine,
The humorous grape, denyes into my base
And wortheles Cruze to spill his sparkling wine.
   So looke on me, my starrs: I neither can
   Picture, engraue, or feast a Noble man.

        .3.
But is there (Muse) no way but one of those
From silence dull, our honest Cell to sheild?
What though the niggard Earth dos not disclose
Her wondrous Jeat, nor glistring ore vs yeild?
The sage prophetique Raven to compose,
Or th’ancient knots, therwith our bower to guild.
   There cannot chuse, but be more wayes to frame
   True honours to the great Norrey'sian name.

        .4.
For why share I this quill? or what doth moue
The Lawrell-louing Phoebus to allow
The neuer fadeing favours of his love
To winde themselues about my simple brow?
